message: Define and throw a dedicated exception instead of using a generic one.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "source" 5 times.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "select * from t1" 11 times.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "insert into t1 select * from source" 5 times.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "insert into t1 values

rule key:
6 times.,CODE_SMELL
java:S2142,428,428,MAJOR,Either re-interrupt this method or rethrow the InterruptedException" that can be caught here.
